toggles.description: Treat responses with status codes in the 500s as failures. See `com.twitter.finagle.http.service.HttpResponseClassifier.ServerErrorsAsFailures`.
Use netty4 as the transport implementation
Use http/2 as the protocol implementation. If it fails to upgrade to http/2, it will downgrade to netty4 http/1.1. Supersedes the com.twitter.finagle.http.UseNetty4 toggle.
